description.en: A member of Balamb Garden's disciplinary committee. He believes in Seifer、 and sticks with him after the sorceress's influence sets Seifer down the wrong path. Though big and tough、 he is also good natured and affable. His purer side can be seen in his fondness for insects and story books.
description.jp:
バラムガーデンの風紀委員。委員長の
サイファーを信頼しており 彼が
「魔女」の手により道を外れても 
仲間として接し続けた。いかつい大男
だが 誰にでもわだかまりなく接する
気のいい性格。昆虫が好きだったり 
物語の本を愛したりする純粋な一面も。

jp.text: そろそろホンキを出すもんよ！
おなごを殴るコブシは持たないもんよ
俺たちゃペラペラな仲間じゃないもんよ！
な なんでもございません！

gl.text: Time to get serious、 ya know!?
I don't hit girls、 ya know?
We're behind Seifer all the way、 ya know!?

desc.en:
6-HIT Thunder melee BRV + HP attack
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
Grants 1 stack of [Roaring Thunder] for 3 turns(limit 3)
Enters [Thunder Stance] for 6 turns

[Roaring Thunder] stacks increase by 1 for every action taken
(except [Discharge], [Discharge+], [Raijin Super])

While [Roaring Thunder] is at 3 stacks
• [HP Attack] to [Discharge]
　∟ 3-HIT AoE Thunder melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
　∟ Deals split damage to all targets
　∟ Inflicts [Paralysis] to all targets for 1 turn
　∟ Resets [Roaring Thunder] stacks to 1

Roaring Thunder
• Raises Max BRV and Attack
• Grants party Thunder Enchant and HP Regen
* Same buffs do not stack
desc.gl:
6-hit Thunder melee BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Self: 3 turns 1 level of Thunderpeal (limit 3); 6 turns Thunder mode
Thunderpeal increases 1 level each turn (except when using Lightning Discharge, Lightning Discharge+, Raijin Pulverizer)
HP Attack becomes Lightning Discharge with 3 levels of Thunderpeal

自身に3ACTION「轟く雷」1段階付与（上限3）し
6ACTION「雷」状態にする
「轟く雷」は自身が行動する度に1段階アップ
（「雷放電」「雷放電＋」「秘技 雷神粉砕撃」使用時は除く）
「轟く雷」3段階付与中
通常「HP攻撃」が「雷放電」に変化
